label: Exactly 8 gluon states
reason: Requires Wolfram Alpha API, experimental data, or advanced computation not yet implemented
note: PENDING: Exactly 8 gluon states. Validation: Color cannot leak to flavor
pythonCode:
from core.FormulasRegistry import get_registry
reg = get_registry()

# Values from SSoT
b3 = reg.b3                      # 24

# Gluon octet from SU(3) color: 3^2 - 1 = 8
# In PM: 8 = b3/3, the color generators
su3_generators = 3 ** 2 - 1      # SU(3) adjoint dimension
gluon_count = b3 // 3            # 24/3 = 8
verified = gluon_count == su3_generators == 8
